questionsData.title: Solid, liquid and gas are states of matter.
A thick kind of mist is called fog .
Rainy weather helps plants to grow well.
A football is rectangular in shape .
"A chicken's beak" means "a chicken's mouth" .
A tractor is a machine used by a doctor.
Sound travels as waves.
A drought is a shortage of food.
The Richter scale is used to measure the strength of volcanoes .
A microscope is used to make small things look bigger.
"Homeless" means "having nowhere to live".
Protection against a disease is called immunity.
"demolished" means "destroyed"
The design of a text means a layout.
"Annum" means "yearly" .
A group of letters that goes in front of a word is a prefix .
Things you use in cooking are ingredients.
Departure and arrival are antonyms.
The sun is closer to the earth than the moon.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The moon is much closer to Earth than the sun. In fact, the sun is an enormous distance away compared to the moon.

  • The moon is approximately 238,855 miles (384,400 kilometers) from Earth.
  • The sun is a staggering 93 million miles (149.6 million kilometers) from Earth.

questionsData.title: The deck is the top level of the ship.
The text is mainly talking about…….
questionsData.article: Air is a mixture of invisible gases, mainly oxygen and nitrogen, that surrounds Earth, It is about one-fifth oxygen and four nitrogen, There are small amounts of water vapor and carbon dioxide in the air. These gases make up less than one percent of air, air has a lot of power, it takes up space, On the surface of Earth, we are at the bottom of a layer of air. The weight of air pushing own on Earth's surface helps create air pressure, When there is less air around you, less pressure is felt, This is a low-pressure areas, Cold air helps create high-pressure areas. It is also a big factor in wind and weather, When there is a difference in air reassure, air is moved, The movement of air is wind, Air pressure and wind affect the weather. Storms develop when there are rapid changes in temperature and air pressure, Hurricanes, thunderstorms, and gentle breezes are all caused by wind and changes air pressure. Air is odorless; we can't smell it. It is also tasteless and invisible Without air, people and other living organism couldn't survive, Air allows plants and animals to exchange the oxygen and carbon dioxide that all living things need to survive.

questionsData.title: I want…… coffee .
Lina is as ….. as Huda.
Football is a very popular game. ….., everybody doesn't enjoy it .
……. move this old wall clock.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The most appropriate word to use here is carefully.

  • Careful and carelessly are adjectives, but they don't describe the action of moving.
  • Carelessness is a noun and refers to a lack of care.
  • Carefully is an adverb that describes how you will move the old wall clock. It

questionsData.title: I saw the students …… the school fence to escape.
We have …. each other since 1997.
A new lesson is being ….. by my teacher.
She is the teacher …… taught me in the school .
questionsData.explain_answer:
She is the teacher who taught me in the school .

Both "who" and "that" can be used to refer to teacher .

The word "who" is a relative pronoun that refers to teacher , indicating that he is the one who taught you English.

  • Which is used for things, not people.
  • Where refers to a location, not a person.
  • When refers to a time, not a person.
